carousel_items: Can make you dizzy or cause trouble concentrating, so be careful using it until you know how the medicine affects you.
Don't use supplements or salt substitutes that are high in potassium.
You can have breast pain/swelling, irregular periods (women), or trouble with sexual performance.
Tell your doctor about any muscle weakness, skin changes, red or black tarry stool.
Can take 2 to 3 days to see full diuretic effects and 2 to 3 weeks to see blood pressure lowering effects.

basics.benefits_moa: Spironolactone is a potassium-sparing diuretic that blocks aldosterone (a hormone) and helps the kidney get rid of excess fluids in your body.
basics.bottom_line: Spironolactone is helpful when added to another diuretic to get rid of excess fluid in your body. Doesn't work well on its own.
downsides: Not very good at getting rid of excess fluids on its own. Should be used with another drug to help get rid of excess fluids.
Has many possible side effects, especially when higher doses are used.
Can increase the risk of tumor growth.
Needs to have blood tests done to monitor electrolyte levels and kidney function.

downsides_processed.orig: Not very good at getting rid of excess fluids on its own. Should be used with another drug to help get rid of excess fluids.
Has many possible side effects, especially when higher doses are used.
Can increase the risk of tumor growth.
Needs to have blood tests done to monitor electrolyte levels and kidney function.

upsides: Has a low risk of causing muscle problems due to low potassium levels in your blood.
More useful when taken with another diuretic that'll also help your body get rid of extra fluids.
Reduces the risk of death in people with heart failure.

upsides_processed.orig: Has a low risk of causing muscle problems due to low potassium levels in your blood.
More useful when taken with another diuretic that'll also help your body get rid of extra fluids.
Reduces the risk of death in people with heart failure.

drugs.one_liner: Removes extra water from your body.

userStories.tip: I took Lasix for the past few months and it took the major lower extremities swelling down in the ER. Then was switched to this drug (Spironolactone) and swelling is back, 9 lbs put on in 24 hours! Very upsetting as it is the weekend.
Caused enlarged breasts, and sore nipples, as well as high glucose levels. scary stuff
I wish I had started at a higher dose from the start. 25mg did nothing, now months later, I'm on 100mg and it's much more effective.
might make you feel tired like beta blockers.

drugs.name: Aldactone

carousel_items_processed.orig: Can make you dizzy or cause trouble concentrating, so be careful using it until you know how the medicine affects you.
Don't use supplements or salt substitutes that are high in potassium.
You can have breast pain/swelling, irregular periods (women), or trouble with sexual performance.
Tell your doctor about any muscle weakness, skin changes, red or black tarry stool.
Can take 2 to 3 days to see full diuretic effects and 2 to 3 weeks to see blood pressure lowering effects.

risks_warnings.title: Tumor development
risks_warnings.description: Use of Spironolactone in rats showed higher risk of tumor growth, so it should only be used for FDA-approved indications.

description_processed.orig: Use of Spironolactone in rats showed higher risk of tumor growth, so it should only be used for FDA-approved indications.

risks_warnings.title: Driving impairment
risks_warnings.description: Spironolactone lowers your ability to focus, think, and react. Be careful and avoid activities that require you to be alert, such as driving a car or operating machinery, until you know how this medicine affects you.
risk_factors: Taking other medicines that make you less alert

description_processed.orig: Spironolactone lowers your ability to focus, think, and react. Be careful and avoid activities that require you to be alert, such as driving a car or operating machinery, until you know how this medicine affects you.

risks_warnings.title: Heart problems from high potassium
risks_warnings.description: Spironolactone can increase the amount of potassium in your body. High potassium can cause heart problems. Baseline and routine blood tests are needed to monitor your potassium and kidney function.

description_processed.orig: Spironolactone can increase the amount of potassium in your body. High potassium can cause heart problems. Baseline and routine blood tests are needed to monitor your potassium and kidney function.

risks_warnings.title: Breast pain or swelling
risks_warnings.description: Spironolactone can cause breast pain or swelling in both men and women. It is generally reversible after stopping the medicine, but rarely can be irreversible.

description_processed.orig: Spironolactone can cause breast pain or swelling in both men and women. It is generally reversible after stopping the medicine, but rarely can be irreversible.

carousel_items: Take Propecia at the same time every day, with or without food.
Hang in there; it can take up to 3 months before you notice any improvement.
You might have a loss of sexual desire or arousal in the beginning.
It's normal to experience hair shedding in the first few months.
Tell your doctor if you notice an unusual rash, swelling of the mouth, tightness in the chest, or trouble breathing.
Using Nizoral shampoo with Propecia greatly helps stop hair loss.

basics.benefits_moa: Propecia is a 5 alpha-reductase inhibitor. It stops dihydrotestosterone (DHT) from shrinking your hair follicles and preventing hair growth. Without DHT, your hair can grow more normally.
basics.bottom_line: Propecia works great for crown balding, as long as you keep taking it.
downsides: Only good for the crown of the head. If you have a receding hairline, Propecia may not work.
If you stop taking it, you will lose the hair you grew while on it.
You need to have your blood tested regularly for signs of prostate cancer while taking Propecia.
Sexual side effects can continue after you stop taking Propecia.
Should never be used by women or children.

downsides_processed.orig: Only good for the crown of the head. If you have a receding hairline, Propecia may not work.
If you stop taking it, you will lose the hair you grew while on it.
You need to have your blood tested regularly for signs of prostate cancer while taking Propecia.
Sexual side effects can continue after you stop taking Propecia.
Should never be used by women or children.

upsides: Helped regrow hair in 88% of men.
Is useful as a supplemental treatment to hair transplant surgery.
Most side effects go away after your body gets used to Propecia.

upsides_processed.orig: Helped regrow hair in 88% of men.
Is useful as a supplemental treatment to hair transplant surgery.
Most side effects go away after your body gets used to Propecia.

userStories.tip: Horrible toxin. Took it for 4 weeks and it destroyed my life. There are thousands of men from every corner of the globe that have been destroyed by this drug..

This drug blocks more than just DHT, it blocks the production of 6 other neurosteroids which can result in anxiety, major depression, brain fog, muscle loss, estrogen dominance and much more. This drug literally ruined my life.
sometimes I stop taking it till I notice my hair loss increase then restart it.

Start taking Propecia before you have a lot of hair loss to save what you have.  It's not a miracle drug that is going to make a bald person have a thick head of hair, but will help you to save what you have.
No obvious effect compared to Flomax, MD says it is insurance

drugs.name: Propecia

off-label_indications.indication: Benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH) with blood in the urine

carousel_items_processed.orig: Take Propecia at the same time every day, with or without food.
Hang in there; it can take up to 3 months before you notice any improvement.
You might have a loss of sexual desire or arousal in the beginning.
It's normal to experience hair shedding in the first few months.
Tell your doctor if you notice an unusual rash, swelling of the mouth, tightness in the chest, or trouble breathing.
Using Nizoral shampoo with Propecia greatly helps stop hair loss.

risks_warnings.title: Exposure to pregnant women
risks_warnings.description: Pregnant women should never handle crushed or broken tablets of Propecia because it can cause really serious birth defects in babies.

description_processed.orig: Pregnant women should never handle crushed or broken tablets of Propecia because it can cause really serious birth defects in babies.

risks_warnings.title: Effects on Prostate Specific Antigen (PSA)
risks_warnings.description: The 5mg form of Propecia is used to treat benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH). In studies, the 1 mg tablet was also able to lower prostate specific antigen (PSA) levels. If PSA levels increase, men taking Propecia should be tested for prostate cancer.

description_processed.orig: The 5mg form of Propecia is used to treat benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH). In studies, the 1 mg tablet was also able to lower prostate specific antigen (PSA) levels. If PSA levels increase, men taking Propecia should be tested for prostate cancer.

risks_warnings.title: High-grade prostate cancer
risks_warnings.description: In 5 mg doses, 5-alpha reductase inhibitors like Propecia, were shown to increase the chances of high-grade prostate cancer in men over the age of 55.

description_processed.orig: In 5 mg doses, 5-alpha reductase inhibitors like Propecia, were shown to increase the chances of high-grade prostate cancer in men over the age of 55.

points.name: Ejaculation disorder

carousel_items: Take Proscar once daily, about the same time each day, with or without food.
Women who can get pregnant shouldn’t touch Proscar tablets.
If you’re taking Proscar with doxazosin, you can take both at the same time or take the doxazosin closer to bedtime to avoid dizziness.

basics.benefits_moa: Proscar blocks the action of 5-alpha-reductase, an enzyme responsible for changing testosterone into dihydrotestosterone (DHT). Lower DHT levels prevents the prostate from growing.
basics.bottom_line: Proscar works well for mild to moderate symptoms of BPH. When men have more severe symptoms, it can be combined with doxazosin or other medicines for added benefits.
downsides: Women who can get pregnant shouldn’t handle broken tablets. Proscar tablets are coated and prevent contact with the active medicine unless they split or break.
You need to take Proscar for at least 6 months before your prostate gets small enough for symptoms to improve.
Can cause a rash, the inability to get an erection, low sex drive, and reduced amount of sperm.

Proscar can cause PSA levels to decrease to about 50% of what it was before you started the medication. This will be considered your new starting point for PSA testing and any PSA tests you have will be compared to this going forward.

downsides_processed.orig: Women who can get pregnant shouldn’t handle broken tablets. Proscar tablets are coated and prevent contact with the active medicine unless they split or break.
You need to take Proscar for at least 6 months before your prostate gets small enough for symptoms to improve.
Can cause a rash, the inability to get an erection, low sex drive, and reduced amount of sperm.

Proscar can cause PSA levels to decrease to about 50% of what it was before you started the medication. This will be considered your new starting point for PSA testing and any PSA tests you have will be compared to this going forward.

upsides: It's an option for men who have symptoms of benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH) and either don’t want surgery or aren’t good candidates it.
In studies, Proscar improved BPH symptoms during the first year of taking it. This effect continued for another 5 years.
Men taking Proscar have less difficulty urinating and don't need BPH-related surgery as often as others.
Can be combined with doxazosin, an alpha-adrenergic antagonist, if your symptoms are more severe. Using both together can improve symptoms and improve BPH symptoms.

upsides_processed.orig: It's an option for men who have symptoms of benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH) and either don’t want surgery or aren’t good candidates it.
In studies, Proscar improved BPH symptoms during the first year of taking it. This effect continued for another 5 years.
Men taking Proscar have less difficulty urinating and don't need BPH-related surgery as often as others.
Can be combined with doxazosin, an alpha-adrenergic antagonist, if your symptoms are more severe. Using both together can improve symptoms and improve BPH symptoms.

drugs.name: Proscar

off-label_indications.indication: Benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH) with blood in the urine

carousel_items_processed.orig: Take Proscar once daily, about the same time each day, with or without food.
Women who can get pregnant shouldn’t touch Proscar tablets.
If you’re taking Proscar with doxazosin, you can take both at the same time or take the doxazosin closer to bedtime to avoid dizziness.

risks_warnings.title: Effects on prostate specific antigen (PSA) and detection of prostate cancer
risks_warnings.description: Proscar causes PSA levels to decrease to about 50% of what it was before you started in the first 6 months of treatment. This will be considered your new starting point for PSA testing and any PSA tests you have will be compared to this going forward. PSA levels should be doubled to compare to normal range in men treated with Proscar. Any increase in PSA while taking Proscar may be a sign of prostate cancer and needs to be checked.

description_processed.orig: Proscar causes PSA levels to decrease to about 50% of what it was before you started in the first 6 months of treatment. This will be considered your new starting point for PSA testing and any PSA tests you have will be compared to this going forward. PSA levels should be doubled to compare to normal range in men treated with Proscar. Any increase in PSA while taking Proscar may be a sign of prostate cancer and needs to be checked.

risks_warnings.title: Prostate cancer
risks_warnings.description: Compared to placebo (sugar pill), Proscar decreased the overall risk of prostate cancer but may increase the risk of high-grade prostate cancer. In a 7-year follow-up study, men age 55 and older had a higher risk of high-grade prostate cancer when taking Proscar.

description_processed.orig: Compared to placebo (sugar pill), Proscar decreased the overall risk of prostate cancer but may increase the risk of high-grade prostate cancer. In a 7-year follow-up study, men age 55 and older had a higher risk of high-grade prostate cancer when taking Proscar.

risks_warnings.title: Harm to male fetus
risks_warnings.description: Proscar may cause birth defects to a male fetus of a pregnant woman who is exposed to the medicine. Proscar crushed or broken tablets can be absorbed through the skin. The unbroken tablets are coated to prevent this. Women shouldn't be in contact with crushed or broken tablets or semen from a male partner taking Proscar.

description_processed.orig: Proscar may cause birth defects to a male fetus of a pregnant woman who is exposed to the medicine. Proscar crushed or broken tablets can be absorbed through the skin. The unbroken tablets are coated to prevent this. Women shouldn't be in contact with crushed or broken tablets or semen from a male partner taking Proscar.

risks_warnings.title: Increased side effects
risks_warnings.description: Proscar is processed by the liver. If you have liver problems, you may need a different dose to prevent increased risk for side effects.

description_processed.orig: Proscar is processed by the liver. If you have liver problems, you may need a different dose to prevent increased risk for side effects.

risks_warnings.title: Sexual problems
risks_warnings.description: It’s not that common, but some people had sexual side effects that continued after they stopped taking Proscar for BPH.  Side effects included problems with erection and orgasm, low sex drive, and reduced amount of sperm. It was more likely to happen in older men, taking medicines that have sexual side effects, and had conditions that cause sexual problems.
risk_factors: Taking medicines that cause sexual side effects
Medical conditions that cause sexual side effects
